name: home
story: You are at home, and you are sitting on the couch thinking of great adventure!
nav: Press 1 to go to the jungle, Press 2 to go to the village, or Press 3 to go to the beach

name: jungle
story: You are in the jungle, hoping to find something exciting
nav: Press 1 to go home, Press 2 to go to the cave, or Press 3 to go to the bridge

name: village
story: You are in the village, watching people passing by
nav: Press 1 to go back home, Press 2 to go to the mall, or Press 3 to go to the beach

name: beach
story: You are at the beach, there is sand everywhere and some people running around in the water
nav: Press 1 to go back home, Press 2 to go to the bar, or Press 3 to go to the dock

name: cave
story: You are in a cave, it is dark in here
nav: Press 1 to go to the jungle, Press 2 to go to the oasis, or Press 3 to go to the lake

name: bridge
story: You are on a bridge, you met Tarzan
nav: Press 1 to go to the jungle, Press 2 to go to the Treehouse, or Press 3 to go to the mall

name: mall
story: You are at the mall, hoping to find someone you know
nav: Press 1 to go to the village, Press 2 to go to Tim Hortons, or Press 3 to go to the jungle

name: bar
story: You are at the bar. You order cocktails
nav: Press 1 to go to the beach, Press 2 to go to the train station, or Press 3 to get on the boat

name: dock
story: You are on the dock, watching pirates ship
nav: Press 1 to go back to the beach, Press 2 to go back home, or Press 3 to get on the boat

name: treehouse
story: You are in Tarzan's treehouse. You see the lake, the waterfall, and the village from here
nav: Press 1 to go to the bridge, Press 2 to go to the lake, or Press 3 to go to the waterfall

name: train
story: You are at the train station. You bought a train ticket
nav: Press 1 to go to the mall, Press 2 to go to Tim Hortons, or Press 3 to get on the boat

name: boat
story: You get on a boat, enjoying ocean view
nav: Press 1 to go to the bar, Press 2 to go to the train station, or Press 3 to go to the dock

name: oasis
story: You are at the Oasis. It is peaceful here
nav: Press 1 to go to the cave, Press 2 to go to the jungle, or Press 3 to explore the oasis

name: lake
story: You found a lake, the water is icing cold
nav: Press 1 to go to the cave, Press 2 to go to the Treehouse, or Press 3 to look around

name: waterfall
story: You are at the waterfall, one of the biggest waterfalls you've ever seen
nav: Press 1 to go to the Treehouse, Press 2 to go dive underwater, or Press 3 to go to the park nearby

name: Tim hortons
story: You are at Tim hortons, sipping your coffee
nav: Press 1 to go to the mall, Press 2 to go to the train station, or Press 3 to go to the park nearby

name: underwater
story: You are underwater, not sure which way to go
nav: Press 1 to go to the waterfall, Press 2 to go to the forest, or Press 3 to dive underwater

name: park
story: You are at the park, so many dogs running around
nav: Press 1 to go to the waterfall, Press 2 to go to Tim Hortons, or Press 3 to get on the boat

name: forest
story: You find yourself deep in the forest. There is a dark path and deep water
nav: Press 1 to walk around, Press 2 to dive under water

name: underwater cave
story: You found two secret caves underwater
nav: Press 1 to dive back, Press 2 to go to the left, or Press 3 to go to the right

name: treasure site
story: You found the treasure site. You collect some gold
nav: Press 1 to go to the oasis, Press 2 to go to the lake, or Press 3 to go to the forest

name: under water doors
story: You found two doors, one green, one red
nav: Press 1 to exit the cave, Press 2 to go through the green door, or Press 3 to go through the red door

name: underwater Prison
story: You are trapped in the underwater prison, you lose!

name: dragon room
story: You got into the room full of dragons! You lose!

name: magic Room
story: You found the portal door to go anywhere you want, you win!
